resources.string:
In order to get the functionality of Dynamic Wallpapers which changes throughout the day, Kaagaz Requires to Keep a Service Running.

Due to Limitations of Android System you'll need to Allow Kaagaz through Battery Saver

Otherwise the Wallpapers won't change with time and will be static. The Battery Consumption is negligible.
Navigate To Battery>Battery optimisation>Tap NOT OPTIMISED>All apps>Kaagaz>Don\'t Optimise or ANY OTHER BATTERY EXCLUSIONS AVAILABLE
After Doing The Above Step, Restart the App and Voila! Your Dynamic Desktop will be then delivered to you in a while!
Error Initializing Startup Service, Turn off Battery Optimisations to Start
Based on Your Xiaomi Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Saver to \'No Restrictions.\' Follow the steps!
Based on Your Oppo Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Related Exclusions. Follow the steps!If not available restart the app!
Based on Your Vivo Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Related Exclusions. Follow the steps! Open iManager and exclude Kaagaz from Battery Section
Based on Your Letv Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Related Exclusions. Follow the steps! to exclude Kaagaz from Battery Section
Not Yet, Try Completing Steps Again!
Full Moon stretches more than two screens, ensure atleast two home screen pages for best results!
The Celestial Wallpaper Changes based on the Current Moon Phase
High Quality Wallpaper, Takes some time to be applied for the first time!
Get the Breeze of a Sea or the Scotch of a Desert, your wallpaper keeps changing by the time of the day!
All of this comes with almost negligible affect to your battery juice

To allow smooth functioning of Kaagaz, the app needs to run in the background.
Got it?
Great!
Let's tell the system!
Do You Want To Quit Kaagaz Service?\nDynamic Desktop will be Stopped
Kaagaz needs Storage Permissions to Download Dynamic Wallpapers
